scripts.build-landing-page: webpack --env page=landing --entry ./src/landing/index.tsx && npm run generate-static-files landing
scripts.build-character-page: webpack --env page=character --entry ./src/character/index.tsx && npm run generate-static-files character
scripts.server: npm run build-landing-page && npm run build-character-page && webpack --env target=server --config server.config.js && node server/server.js
